title: Zack Snyder's Justice League
plot: Determined to ensure that Superman's ultimate sacrifice wasn't in vain, Bruce Wayne recruits a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.
cast: Henry Cavill, Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot, Amy Adams

title: Soul
plot: Joe is a middle-school band teacher whose life hasn't quite gone the way he expected. His true passion is jazz. But when he travels to another realm to help someone find their passion, he soon discovers what it means to have soul.
cast: Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey, Graham Norton, Rachel House
